sentences.en: At the receive end, we can not only get the undistorted range profile image, but also get some available conclusion by use of the crasis of the extent.
sentences.cn: 在收端，通过对获得的一对复侧影像幅度的联合处理（融合），达到获得不失真的侧影像幅度的目的，且能够恢复目标的实际轮廓。

sentences.en: But how do we know we have the true, undistorted picture of reality?
sentences.cn: 然而我们如何敢断定自己看到的现实景象是真切的 、 不失真的 呢 ?

sentences.en: His judgment was undistorted by emotion.
sentences.cn: 他的判断不受情绪的影响.

sentences.en: Only in quiet waters do things mirror themselves undistorted.
sentences.cn: 只有平静的水面才能照映出他们未失真的一面。

sentences.en: This paper introduces the basic methods of undistorted reduction undistorted compression data.
sentences.cn: 文章论述了数据的无损还原的基本方法.

sentences.en: What characteristics should a graph contain in order that the image of the data be undistorted?
sentences.cn: 什么样的特性是依序包含未失真资料典型的曲线?

words.tran_cn: 未失真的；不偏激的；[电子]无畸变的

trans.tran_cn: 未失真的，不偏激的，无失真
